feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2021-05-13: Experimental v. 8.0.4 is available
entry.content: Experimental v. 8.0.4 is available. The MPV media player replaced VLC for great improvements! See http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html for details
entry.summary: Experimental v. 8.0.4 is available. The MPV media player replaced VLC for great improvements! See http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html for details

entry.title: 2021-05-12: v. 7.10.5 is available
entry.content: v. 7.10.5 is available. Set max play rate to 100x, a bug fixed
entry.summary: v. 7.10.5 is available. Set max play rate to 100x, a bug fixed

entry.title: 2021-05-10: v. 7.10.4 is available
entry.content: v. 7.10.4 is available. One bug fixed in the behavior binary table function
entry.summary: v. 7.10.4 is available. One bug fixed in the behavior binary table function

entry.title: 2021-04-29: v. 7.10.3 is available
entry.content: v. 7.10.3 is available. 2 bugs were fixed. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
entry.summary: v. 7.10.3 is available. 2 bugs were fixed. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history

entry.title: 2021-01-27: v. 7.10.2 is available
entry.content: v. 7.10.2 is available. Some improvements made and bugs fixed. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
entry.summary: v. 7.10.2 is available. Some improvements made and bugs fixed. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
